credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Design for an altar
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash
description: Vertical rectangle. A sketch for the right part of a similar design as -1360. Its lower part has been drawn over with a sketch, showing two attempts to place the tabernacle into the lower  part of the altar ledges into which the former dado and steps are transformed. In the upper left corner is written "N 62", corrected from "4".
name: Drawing
